reviewText: With Cantinflas you can never go wrong. Hilarious comedy.

I loved watching these movies as a kid growing up. Good, honest humor, and nothing vulgar about them. Cantinflas was the greatest comedian actor of his time, and all his movies had a lesson or 2 to teach. I can truly say, my quick wit to respond with sarcasm to people and my fast spoken humor... is because of this great Mexican actor's movies.
It was a gift. I understand everyone enjoyed the DVD

For my private collection of Cantinflas movies.  I love this Mexican comedian.

Hello everybody:
I'd like to ask for help from Cantinflas' film fans about a movie which title I don't remember.
It's a b/w movie, maybe early 50's, in which the big C plays a window cleaner who witnesses the usual good-for-nothing beau of the usual rich lady robbing her jewels from her bedroom case, while C cleans her bedroom window..
After that, and the implication being that the thief could only be a humble working man, the generously sombreroed mexican police detectives arrive at C's cleaner's shop, and the leader (and fatter) of the pack asks "A ver! De quien es este Changarro?" To which our heroe answers in a milestone of answers: "Es mio! Ahora, sufra!!".
For me, that's one of the golden jokes of this wonderful comedian, along with "Acaso sois aguardado?; "Aguardado lo sereis vos!" (from "The Three Musketeers"), and the golden speech to his captain, when having found a bomb, in "El Gendarme Desconocido".
For your help, many thanks and good hours of joy while watching these wonderful movies by Mario M.
